name: Stergos Strambopoulos
personality: Determined and loyal, but can be hot-headed at times.
story: Stergos grew up in a small village in Greece. He has always been interested in the military and joined the army as soon as he turned 18. He quickly rose through the ranks and became a Corporal. His determination and loyalty earned him a position as Asst. Gunner for a Heavy Machine Gun team. Stergos takes pride in his work and is always willing to put himself in harm's way to protect his fellow soldiers.
